title: Is Bill Gates and ID2020 using COVID-19 to build a global observer state?
subtitle: The conspiracy's theories distort Bill Gates' funding for immunization and digital identity research as evidence of an awful global surveillance plan that the Book of Revelation foretold.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Bill Gates - along with an alliance called "ID 2020" - seeks to "microchip" the world's population using the COVID-19 vaccine.
